tags.name: Irugur Junction
tags.note:
Irugur Junction is a railway station in Irugur, Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu, India.
The station has two platforms and is a junction on the Coimbatore Junction–Erode Junction main line with branch line towards Mettupalayam.
